ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Mage Focus Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I got the shovel, broom and stein doing the quests at the temple in the Lavastorm zone (forgot the name). Never got the torch because I got tired of
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I got the shovel, broom and stein doing the quests at the temple in the
Lavastorm zone (forgot the name). Never got the torch because I got tired of
killing mages in Najena. I don't use the fire pet that often anywayz. In
theory all the main items for quest can be found in Najena.

If you have more q's let me know.

Jedhevavhe 55 Conjuror
Kane Bayle


----- Original Message -----
From: "Steven Hulse" <steveh@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 24, 2002 8:50 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Mage Focus Items


> Hi everyone!
>
> I'm getting ready to work on my Mage Focus Items specifically the Shovel
Of Ponz and the Torch Of Alna. According to the info I have found, for the
SoP I need to get a shovel off an alligator in Cazic Thule. However CT no
longer has the gator there, they have been moved. My question is after the
move to their new location do they still drop a shovel?
>
> The Torch of Alna requires a torch off of a Mage in Najena. I tried to
find this mage but didn't have much luck. Has anyone done this? Also the
info I have says the torch also drops off of an alligator? Is this true?
>
> I'm just trying to clear up some confusion so I may get started on this
personal quest.
>
> Thanks!
> Shizney
> lvl~14 Gnome Mage
>
